about_the_game:
Multiplayer Clash of Tanks and FPV Drones

The clash of tanks and drones symbolizes the evolution of conflict, blending AI, agility, and advanced technology into a high-tech duel for dominance.

Engage in high-stakes multiplayer matches where two players go head-to-head. One controls a tank with a mission to reach its destination. The other pilots an FPV drone, aiming to destroy the tank before it completes its route. The round ends when the tank reaches the target or is eliminated. Players then switch roles. The first to win two rounds claims victory!

Choose Your Side in the Tech War
Join one of two factions:

West  East 

Key Features:

  • Tactical duels with role-switching mechanics.

  • Immersive FPV drone controls with a first-person perspective.

  • Rank progression from Private to Captain, with upgradeable equipment.

  • Modifications: dynamic armor, electronic countermeasures (ECM), and speed boosters for drones.

  • Unique strategies for each faction.

Will you lead your tank to victory or destroy it with the cutting-edge tactics of FPV drones? The choice is yours!

name: Drones vs Tanks

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600 / AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 / AMD Radeon RX 570 with 4 GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-9700K / AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 / AMD Radeon RX 6600 XT with 6 GB VRAM or higher
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible

short_description: Multiplayer Clash of Tanks and FPV Drones. Dive into a thrilling multiplayer showdown where one player controls a tank aiming to reach its destination, while the other pilots an FPV drone tasked with stopping it. Choose your faction, upgrade your vehicles, and compete in fast-paced rounds!
